entity.name: Going Out
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.

text: @politico “Well, first of all, every American's heart has to go out to the victims of the coronavirus. So, I don't want to talk about a victory lap over a very unfortunate, very malignant disease. But the fact is, it does give businesses yet another thing to consider...”
